Name: Distribution Panel - Capacity: 1200 to 2000 Amp - Equipment that is either hard anchored or is vibration isolated with seismic snubbers/restraints - Anchorage fragility only

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing is per unit and is based upon 1600 Amp.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: User to provide median demand and dispersion values.  The values listed are default PACT values and do not represent the response of this component.

DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair anchorage and concrete pad (if floor mounted and wall if wall mounted) and remount equipment.

DamageStates.Description: Anchorage failure & Equipment damaged beyond repair.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace equipment in addition to repairing anchorage and concrete pad if floor mounted or wall if wall mounted.
